Yuma.Ray Kroc Baseball Complex:
The Ray Kroc Baseball Complex is a multi-field complex located in Yuma, Arizona. It serves as host complex to Major League Baseball spring training games and occasionally hosts concerts and WWE professional wrestling events.
The complex serves as the home of the independent Yuma Scorpions of the North American Baseball League, who play primarily at Desert Sun Stadium, and for the NABL's developmental Arizona Winter League and Arizona Summer League.
